text:
Context: 
- log4net sends log events through UDP transport.
- on first run, chainsaw receives and displays correctly all columns including the custom properties.
- Since some columns are irrelevant, they are removed (CurrentTab => LogPanel Preferences => columns)
- Next day, chainsaw is kicked off again and same events are forwarded to the udp receiver. However, the fist row shows that column contents that should not appear appear in the wrong columns (as if no column had been removed). The second row does not display and the console shows the following exception trace.
